description:
*** For all Instagram Lovers !! ***

It's a completely FREE App! No in-app purchases to unlock features.

Squaready is the EASIEST, FASTEST and most FLEXIBLE way to post entire photos on Instagram without cropping.
Millions of people are actually using this app everyday.

► highly recommend Instagram users!
‣ Post Entire Photos on Instagram Without Cropping !!
‣ Make a rectangle photo into square shape "Insta-size".
‣ Choose a Colorful Background.
‣ Directly Sharing Posting to Instagram.

► Built-in Full-featured and Poweful Photo Editor
‣ Various Stylish Filters
‣ Color Splash
‣ Tilt-Shift Blur
‣ Draw Lines
‣ Text Input and Meme
‣ Frames and Stickers
‣ Crop and Straighten
‣ And many other features!

► Other Great Features
▹ Camera+ API support 
▹ High-res export.
▹ EXIF/GPS Location data ready 
▹ Load a image from Clipboard at startup. 
▹ One-touch Easy cropping 
▹ Easily correct centering.
▹ Instagram Preview Mode
▹ Support Facebook, Twitter and Mail 
▹ External-editing mode ready 

► Support for Beginners 
- Instruction document 
- Pop-up Tips 
- Squaready Gallery 

[NOTE] If you want,  please add hashtag #squaready when you post photos with this App.
releaseNotes:
- Adjusted the processing of background blur.
- Revived the function of "blur" in the built-in image editor.
- Fixed an issue that rarely crashes.
- Fixed some minor issues.
